```go
package main

import "fmt"

type Developer struct {
    Name       string
    Location   string
    Expertise  []string
    Learning   string
    Hobbies    []string
}

func main() {
    me := Developer{
        Name:      "Md. Azizul Hoq",
        Location:  "Bangladesh ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡©",
        Expertise: []string{"Go", "Node.js", "DevOps", "System Design"},

}
```
